readable.title: 327621377_0bc3b7fd26
readable.content: A black dog holds a tire and a ball in his mouth as another follows him . A black dog is chasing another black dog that 's carrying a ball in its mouth . A black dog is chasing another black dog who is holding a ball , a wheel , and some red rope . A black dog runs with a deflated ball and a tiny tire . one black dog running with a ball and small tire in his mouth while another black dog follows .
